name: Snake Galaxy Online
description:
Snake Galaxy Online is the first of many other games that Vivid Unity Games want to bring to Steam. We welcome you to the family and hope you enjoy and have fun with our work.

Adventure awaits you in Snake Galaxy Online!

Snake Galaxy Online offers the soul of the classic Snake but fully adapted to modernity. Your mission is to defy the wrath of an intergalactic monster to save your friends.

Embark on an adventure and cross 3 galaxies with more than 30 planets to explore. Enter gigantic beaches, huge deserts, desolate swamps, labyrinthine mines, and discover their secrets.
Practice makes a master: Endless and Multiplayer modes are here!

In addition to the extensive Adventure mode, you can practice all your moves while getting prizes in the Endless mode.
Do you feel ready enough to be called the best Snake Galaxy Online player? Then you will have the chance to prove your worth in the PVP battles of 1vs1 and a Free for All mode that includes four players at the same time!

Customize and be unique

We are all different, why can't a snake be different too? Play any mode to unlock Hats, Skins and Avatars to change your snake's style and make your stay in Snake Galaxy Online a unique experience.

—---------

Snake Galaxy Online es el primero de muchos otros juegos que desde Vivid Unity Games queremos traer a Steam. Te damos la bienvenida a la familia y esperamos que disfrutes y te diviertas con nuestro trabajo.
